datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard include criteria related to controlled access to the food production site
Does the standard require that the food production site has pest control procedures in place
Does the standard require that food harvesting/processing utensils are cleaned, disinfected/sanitized, maintained and protected from contamination
Does the standard require a risk assessment of the production site and processes (risks of contamination)
Does the standard require that the food production site has site and facilities cleaning procedures
Does the standard require that the food production site has site and facilities disinfection procedures
Does the standard require that the production site is constructed using appropriate materials to avoid risk of food contamination
Does the standard address production site location as a critical control point of the food management system
Does the standard require that staff changing facilities, lockers and catering areas follow proper specifications for food production sites
Does the standard require that staff eating places are segregated from production areas in the food production site
Does the standard include requirements for hand washing and toilet hygiene for staff facilities in the food production site
Does the standard require that the food production site has a waste management system (volume, toxicity, recycling, discharge)
Does the standard require that the food production site has waste water drainage, discharge, re-using and recycling processes
Does the standard require monitoring of volumes and quality of water supply to the food production site
